==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=on|いち|ごん}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=いちごん}} compound {{m|zh|一言|tr=ʔjit ngjon|lit=one + speech, word}}. The [[呉音#Japanese|goon]], so likely the initial borrowing.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|いちごん|y=goon|acc=h|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|いちごん}}

# a (single) [[word]], a few words

=====Idioms=====
{{der-top|Idioms}}
* {{ja-r|一言以って之を蔽う|いちごん もって これ を おお.う}}: “to cover this with one word/phrase” → to [[sum up]] complicated details in a few short words
* {{ja-r|一言も無い|いちごん も ない}}: “not even a word” → to be [[speechless]]; to have nothing to say
* {{ja-r|一言一句|いちごん いっく}}: “one word on phrase” → word by word, distinctly {{qualifier|as when speaking carefully}}
* {{ja-r|一言半句|いちごん はんく}}: “one word half a phrase” → word by word, distinctly {{qualifier|as when speaking carefully}}
* {{ja-r|一言既に出ずれば駟馬も追い難し|いちごん すで に いずれば しば も おいがたし}}: “a word once said is hard to catch even with a four-horse team”
{{der-bottom}}

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|一言居士|いちごん こじ}}: a person who must [[speak one's mind|speak their mind]] about everything
* {{ja-r|一言詩|いちごん し}}: a traditional [[poem]] wherein a single character is used to fit the [[meter]] of a whole line
{{der-bottom}}

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|いちごん}}

# to [[say]] a few words

=====Conjugation=====
{{ja-suru|いちごん}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=on|いち|げん}}
Shift in pronunciation from ''ichigon'' above, using the [[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]] of ''gen'' for the {{ja-l|言}} character.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|いちげん|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|いちげん}}

# a (single) [[word]], a few words

=====Idioms=====
{{der-top|Idioms}}
* {{ja-r|一言以って之を蔽う|いちげん もって これ を おお.う}}: “to cover this with one word/phrase” → to [[sum up]] complicated details in a few short words
{{der-bottom}}

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|一言一行|いちげん いっこう}}: one action and one word
* {{ja-r|一言居士|いちげん こじ}}: a person who must [[speak one's mind|speak their mind]] about everything
{{der-bottom}}

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|いちげん}}

# to [[say]] a few words

=====Conjugation=====
{{ja-suru|いちげん}}

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=kun|ひと|こと}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ひとこと|一|tr1=hito|t1=one|言|tr2=koto|t2=word, speech}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|ひとこと|y=kun|dev=1|acc=2|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ひとこと}}

# a (single) [[word]], a few words

=====Idioms=====
